item.title: Adobe aims to achieve the highest level of performance in order to increase repeat visits and online sales
item.description:
Source: Adobe. Recent Adobe research indicates that marketers in the Asia Pacific region who use best practices are significantly outperforming their competitors. The Adobe Digital Index Best of the Best Benchmark for Asia Pacific analyzed websites across six regions: Australia and New Zealand, Southeast Asia, India, South Korea, Hong Kong, and China, comparing the average website performance with the top 20% based on six key performance indicators: mobile and tablet traffic, stick rate, visits per visitor, time spent, and conversion rate...

item.title: Holiday spending in Singapore is expected to exceed S$4 billion by the end of the year
item.description:
Source: Adobe. A minimum of 10% of all online sales in Australia, mainland China, Singapore, Japan, New Zealand, Hong Kong, and Thailand occur during the year-end holiday season. This holiday season, Singaporean shoppers are predicted to heavily utilize their mobile devices for online shopping, according to the latest Adobe Digital Index Holiday Shopping Prediction. Tablets and smartphones are anticipated to be crucial to shoppers in Singapore, with purchases made on these devices projected to represent 17% of all online sales from now until Christmas...
